key_facts: The Trump administration withdrew from international climate efforts.
Cop30 president André Corrêa do Lago emphasized U.S. importance in climate solutions.
Corrêa do Lago cited U.S. innovation, technology, and private sector as assets.
Cop30 will be held in Belém, Brazil.
Cop30 is the first climate summit held in the Amazon.
The summit will focus on implementing existing climate commitments.
Brazil will spotlight climate justice at Cop30.
Brazil will highlight Indigenous leadership at Cop30.
Brazil plans to emphasize meaningful emissions reductions.
Corrêa do Lago urged nations to submit ambitious climate plans.
Corrêa do Lago stressed the need to make climate plans investable.
Summit organizers are engaging businesses and investors early.
Organizers aim to ensure real-world impact from Cop30.
Brazil sent a letter warning against the 'banality of inaction.'
The letter called for collective action amid global challenges.
